quote_first: It was the middle of the night when the phone rang. He opened his eyes to find the clock reading
quote_last: . At first he was too groggy to grasp why a bell might be ringing nearby, but he shook his head and, almost unconsciously, picked up the receiver and held it to his ear.
title: Blind Willow, Sleeping Woman
author: Haruki Murakami

quote_last: a policeman observed the place in darkness, but with the stranger's motor still at the curb.
title: The Shadow Out of Time
author: H.P. Lovecraft

quote_last: a policeman observed the place in darkness, but with the stranger's motor still at the curb.
title: The Shadow Out of Time
